```{r}
library("blockrand")
library("knitr")
library("dplyr")
```

```{r}

listr <- blockrand(n=32,
num.levels = 2,
id.prefix='patient_',
block.sizes = sample(2:6,16, replace = TRUE) ,
levels=c("A", "B")
) 
write.csv2(listr,"randomisation_kinepanch_2.csv", row.names = FALSE) 
```
